Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Ascott Maillen Shenzhen in Shenzhen (Shekou), you'll be convenient to Shekou Ferry Terminal and Chiwan Tin Hau Temple. This 4-star aparthotel is within the vicinity of Tomb of the Young Song Emperor and Shenzhen University.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 199 air-conditioned rooms featuring DVD players. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access is available. Private bathrooms have deep soaking bathtubs and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don’t miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including a health club, an indoor pool, and an outdoor tennis court.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the aparthotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or grab a snack at a coffee shop/café. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and express check-out.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the aparthotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or grab a snack at a coffee shop/café. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Don’t miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including a health club, an indoor pool, and an outdoor tennis court.

With a stay at Ascott Maillen Shenzhen in Shenzhen (Shekou), you'll be convenient to Shekou Ferry Terminal and Chiwan Tin Hau Temple. This 4-star aparthotel is within the vicinity of Tomb of the Young Song Emperor and Shenzhen University.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Shekou Ferry Terminal - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Chiwan Tin Hau Temple - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Tomb of the Young Song Emperor - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Shenzhen University - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Xin'an Nantou Ancient City - 6 km / 3.7 mi
Zhongshan Park - 7 km / 4.3 mi
Window of the World - 8.3 km / 5.2 mi
He Xiangning Art Museum - 8.7 km / 5.4 mi
Splendid China Folk Village - 9.1 km / 5.6 mi
Mangrove Seashore Ecological Park - 9.2 km / 5.7 mi
Chinese Overseas City - 9.2 km / 5.7 mi
Happy Valley - 9.3 km / 5.8 mi
Hong Kong Wetland Park - 10.1 km / 6.3 mi
Tin Shui Wai Park - 10.4 km / 6.4 mi
Kingswood Ginza Shopping Center - 10.4 km / 6.5 mi

The nearest airports are:
Hong Kong (HKG-Hong Kong Intl.) - 19.7 km / 12.3 mi
Shenzhen (SZX-Shenzhen Intl.) - 19.7 km / 12.3 mi

The preferred airport for Ascott Maillen Shenzhen is Hong Kong (HKG-Hong Kong Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
